dataset.title: Ecohydrology and Ecophysiology in Watershed 1 at the Andrews Experimental Forest

address.deliveryPoint: Oregon State University;Dept. of Forest Science;330 Richardson Hall

section.para: This database was developed to store soil moisture, soil temperature, air temperature, and relative humidity data recorded at the telemetry transect located in watershed 01 of the HJ Andrews Experimental Forest. Data are recorded at a cross-sectional transect located near the mouth of WS01. Data are automatically transmitted via a telemetry network to a central computer.

intellectualRights.para: Welcome to the H. J. Andrews LTER Database. Our intentions are to make our data as freely available as possible (See Data Availability). Our data sets consist of long-term research study data with accompanying documentation (metadata). Spatial and non-spatial data sets are available as well as software and models. We encourage the use of our data sets, but as a professional courtesy we ask that data users read and agree to the terms of our Data Use Agreement. It is considered a matter of professional ethics to acknowledge the work of other scientists that results in data used in subsequent research. Therefore, Andrews Forest researchers request appropriate citation and acknowledgement for subsequent distribution or publication of any work derived from these data sets. Data users are strongly encouraged to consider consultation, collaboration and/or co-authorship with original investigators.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Watershed 1 at the Andrews Experimental Forest

address.deliveryPoint: Oregon State University;Dept. of Forest Science;330 Richardson Hall

section.title: Experimental Design - TW006
section.para: Eight plots located across a cross-sectional transect of WS01.

section.title: Field Methods - TW006
section.para: Data are sent to central computing system via a telemetry system maintained by HJ Andrews.

section.title: Statistical Methods - TW006
section.para: Custom regression equation used to convert soil moisture output from milliVolts to water content (see Czarnomski et al. 2005)

section.title: Permanent Plots - TW006
section.para: Plots are located near transect 1 of the permanent vegetation plots (TP073) in WS01.
